Detailed Description

BtCancelableBroadcastRequest is a child class of BtCancelableRequest and implements the common properties for requests that realize a broadcast (all devices in the range) communication and that can be interrupted. Any further concrete requests that address all devices in its range and that can be canceled are not directly derived from BtRequest. Instead of this they should be child classes of BtCancelableBroadcastRequest.
See BtRequest for a complete description of Bluetooth requests.
